refnamediv.refpurpose: Return the width and height of a previously opened or created image.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in image. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
Return the width and height of a previously opened or created image. An image can be loaded with imageload. An empty image can be created with imagecreate.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: iimagenum -- the reference of the image.. It should be a value returned by imageload or imagecreate.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the imagesize opcode. It uses the file imageopcodes.csd and imageOpcode01.png.
Example of the imagesize opcode.
Its output should include a line like this:
